description:
Abel has been hitting the gym pretty hard lately. In the month or so since I last saw him, he's put on a good amount of muscle. When I went to pick him for his blow job, I couldn't believe how much bigger he'd gotten. Of course, he was really nervous and fidgeted the whole way to the studio. He also had a ton of questions and was trying really hard to prove to me that he's straight.
Alex had just moved to United States from France and had contacted us about being in a movie. I had never worked with him before, and unfortunately his English was not very good. That made getting the movie started rather awkward as he couldn't understand what I was telling him. However, he seemed fascinated by Abel's physique and didn't have any difficulty kissing Abel's bubble butt or sucking on his hard cock...
title: Blowing Abel
